D

DataClassifier - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities
This class fulfills all the responsibilities that concern the building of classifiers and it produce the human-readable results.
DataClassifier(Instances) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.DataClassifier
Create an instance that can be used for build one classifier (using the buildClassifier(Classifier) method)
DataClassifier(Instances, List<Classifier>) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.DataClassifier
Create an instance and cycle on the classifier's list and build them.
DataEvaluator - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities
This class fulfills all the responsibilities that concern to the evaluation of the classifiers, including the execution of the cross validation.
DataEvaluator() - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.DataEvaluator
 
DataExperimenter - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment
This class fulfills all the responsibilities that concern the configuration and the performing of a weka experiment, either the standard and the customized one;
DataExperimenter(List<Classifier>, DefaultListModel<File>) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment.DataExperimenter
The constructor that have to be used to specify more then one datasets to analyze.
DataExperimenter(List<Classifier>, DefaultListModel<File>, String) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment.DataExperimenter
The constructor that have to be used to specify more then one datasets to analyze, and that allow to specify the path where the experiment statistics and result will be saved.
DataExperimenter(List<Classifier>, DatasetHandler) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment.DataExperimenter
The constructor that could be used if you want to specify just one dataset
DataExperimenter(List<Classifier>, DatasetHandler, String) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment.DataExperimenter
The constructor that could be used if you want to specify just one dataset and that allow to specify the path where the experiment statistics and result will be saved.
DatasetHandler - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.core
Class that wrap the dataset and provide some method can be useful to handle it.
DatasetHandler(String) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.DatasetHandler
Create an instance of a DatasetHandler and load the dataset
DatasetHandler(Instances) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.DatasetHandler
Create an instance of a DatasetHandler
doRun(int) - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment.CustomCrossValidationResultProducer
Gets the results for a specified run number.
